content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_block
inventory=[{"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 34, "index": 35}]

thought: To craft a purpur_block, I need to first craft 4 popped_chorus_fruit. To do this, I need to first smelt 1 chorus_fruit, and then I can move it to the crafting grid. I will smelt the chorus_fruit from slot 12 into an empty slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_block
inventory=[{"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 34, "index": 35}]
thought: I still need to craft 3 more popped_chorus_fruit, so I will smelt the chorus_fruit from slot 12 into an empty slot (eg., 15).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 15 with quantity 1

thought: I still need to craft 2 more popped_chorus_fruit, so I will smelt the chorus_fruit from slot 12 into an empty slot (eg., 17).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 17 with quantity 1

Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_block
inventory=[{"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 34, "index": 35}]

Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
